nodes.text: Sabri was a female Human Lieutenant of the Imperial Reclamation Service of the Sith Empire living during the Galactic War. Following the Battle of Rishi, she was part of Darth Marr's force that traveled to Yavin 4 and established the anti-Revanite coalition along with Republic forces under Satele Shan. The only person in her unit assigned to operate on the service, Sabri asked a fellow Coalition member to retrieve the ancient Sith artifacts around the Temple of Sacrifice for preservation.
Lieutenant Sabri appears in the Star Wars: The Old Republic: Shadow of Revan expansion, released on December 2, 2014.
